### Also, it complies with the following
- In case of a `new component`
  - [ ] A folder with its name on `src/components/CORRESPONDING_CATEGORY/COMPONENT_NAME`.
  - [ ] A `index.tsx` file for the component's code.
  - [ ] New and/or updated interfaces, types, tuples, and enums for the component
  - [ ] A `index.test.ts` file for its unit tests and create the needed to reach at least `95%` of code coverage.
  - [ ] A `index.stories.tsx` file for Storybook stories and add at least two stories for different scenarios.

- In case of a `bug` or an `existing component update`.
  - [ ] Updated unit tests that reach at least `95%` of code coverage.
  - [ ] Updated interfaces, types, tuples, and enums for the impacted component/s.
